description.translate:
If you want to be part of the $(b;summer)Golden Seelie Court$(), you better look the part.
I can't present you as my champion before $(b;summer)Queen Titania$() when you look like this. 

Gather some $(b;summer)golden ingots$() and $(b;spring)craft$() yourself some human size $(b;spring)armor$()!
Don't look at me like that! I'm not paying for it!
Go on. Present yourself to me when you are properly attired.

The audacity... - the Pixies sighs-
